price: 45 C’est ainsi que furent anéanties les nations impies. Louange à Allah, Seigneur de la Création !
arabic: فَقُطِعَ دَابِرُ ٱلۡقَوۡمِ ٱلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُواْۚ وَٱلۡحَمۡدُ لِلَّهِ رَبِّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: faquṭiʿa dābiru al-qawmi alladhīna ẓalamū wal-ḥamdu lillahi rabbi al-ʿālamīna
